channel.title: Making a spec for another wep that is not added in your server client.java

item.title: Making a spec for another wep that is not added in your server client.java
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

how do i make a magic bow special, i am using project czar source (if you can write the code) this is what i have and it doesnt work

} if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount <= 50) {//bow startAnimation(426); DDZ(); specialDamage = 20 + misc.random(10); specialAmount -= 75; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 100) {//bow startAnimation(426); DDZ(); specialDamage = 20 + misc.random(10); specialAmount -= 75; }

what should the code be??

Read full topic
item.source: Making a spec for another wep that is not added in your server client.java
